Technology.Name: Xeno Genetics
Technology.LongDescription: By studying alien plants, animals, and microganisms, we have learned many new genetic secrets. By applying some of what we have learned to our own bodies, we are able to live much longer and healthier lives.

UnlockedBonus.Name: Increased Lifespans
UnlockedBonus.Description: Gain an empire-wide 25% bonus to population growth from increased lifespans
